Rebirth of the Villainess: The Life of Letizia After the Engagement Annulment
Wakeari akuyaku reijō wa, kon'yaku haki-go no jinsei o jiyū ni ikiru
Wakeari Akuyaku Reijou ha, Kon'yaku Hakigo no Jinsei wo Jiyuu ni Ikiru
Wakeari Akuyaku Reijou wa, Konyaku Hakigo no Jinsei wo Jiyuu ni Ikiru
事出有因的恶役千金，废除婚约后过上自由生活
訳あり悪役令嬢は、婚約破棄後の人生を自由に生きる
author: Uzuki Mitsubi
description: Due to various circumstances, Letzia, the daughter of a ducal house, sought to have her engagement with the prince dissolved. Her efforts were successfully rewarded when the prince splendidly (?) ordered the annulment of their engagement. Just when she thought everything was settled… she remembered her past life! Remembering her busy days as a nurse, Letzia is determined to live an easy life accompanied by her beloved alcohol. To this end, she sets her sights on the easygoing countryside, but for some reason, she gets dragged into incident after incident?!
